title: COVID-19 Vaccine
cleaned_text: COVID-19 Vaccine Vaccination Locations Jefferson County Public Health Clinic in Port Townsend - Pfizer (Bivalent booster only for 5+); Moderna (All doses for ages 6 months and older); Novavax (12 and older) - Must make an appointment. - Port Townsend clinic is beside the entrance to the QFC grocery store - (360) 385-9400 Jefferson Healthcare in Port Townsend - Jefferson Healthcare Sheridan Clinic is now scheduling nurse-visit vaccine appointments for children. Established Jefferson Healthcare patients only. Call or text (360)-379-8031 for an appointment. - Adult patients enrolled with a Jefferson Healthcare primary care provider may be able to schedule a COVID-19 vaccination/booster through the primary care clinics in Port Townsend in conjunction with a provider visit. Jefferson Healthcare at Port Ludlow's Pharmacy - Pfizer (12 and older) - Must make an appointment by phone. - (360) 379-2254 QFC - Pfizer (12 and older); Moderna (12 and older); Moderna (18 and older) [https://www.safeway.com/vaccinations/home?cmpid=ps_swy_sea_cov_goo_20210125_71700000078884714_58700006657329570_43700060090453483&gclid=EAIaIQobChMItr2egMDo8AIVFbfICh3KoAswEAAYASAAEgJWlvD_BwE&gclsrc=aw.ds](https://www.safeway.com/vaccinations/home?cmpid=ps_swy_sea_cov_goo_20210125_71700000078884714_58700006657329570_43700060090453483&gclid=EAIaIQobChMItr2egMDo8AIVFbfICh3KoAswEAAYASAAEgJWlvD_BwE&gclsrc=aw.ds) [Click here to (360) 385-2860 (Port (360) 681-2120 (Sequim) or (360) 297-1811 (Kingston) Tri-Area Pharmacy in Port Hadlock - Pfizer (12 and older only); Moderna (18 and older) - Several days a week, first come, first served. Call to inquire what day vaccines are offered. - (360) 379-9800 Costco - Pfizer (12 and older); Moderna (12 and older); Johnson & Johnson (18 and older) Bivalent (omicron) booster available [https://waitwhile.com/book/costcorx-00639/service](https://waitwhile.com/book/costcorx-00639/service) [Click here to schedule.](https://waitwhile.com/book/costcorx-00639/service) Walgreens and [Click here to schedule](https://www.walgreens.com/topic/promotion/covid-vaccine.jsp?ext=gooFY23_GOO_ICP_CDV_COVID%2BVaccine_LG_SRC_TXT_EXACT_NA_Brand_ENGCDV_Brand_Booster_EXACT_walgreens%2520covid%2520booster&gclsrc=aw.ds&gclid=Cj0KCQjwla-hBhD7ARIsAM9tQKsgN8krdXIMqS0anSX26VQQpusgLoWWcT-dYG06RSyophwmc_fL1_4aAsYlEALw_wcB). [https://jeffersoncountypublichealth.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=793](https://jeffersoncountypublichealth.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=793) - (360) 681-2018 Walmart - Pfizer (5 and older); Moderna (18 and older) [https://jeffersoncountypublichealth.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=793](https://jeffersoncountypublichealth.org/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=793) [Click here to schedule.](https://www.walmart.com/cp/flu-shots-immunizations/1228302). - (360) 683-9453 Rite Aid - Pfizer (3 and older); Moderna (18 and older) [Click here to schedule](https://www.riteaid.com/pharmacy/scheduler) - (360) 681-0129 (Sequim) or (360) 297-5200 (Kingston) Washington State Vaccine Locator: To find a Covid-19 vaccine in WA
